attributes.action: Bring Back Football Home Nations Tournament
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the looming prospect of England failing to qualify for 2008 what a great opportunity to ressurrect the Home Nations Championships. This would be a great spectacle to promote British football, would be a good dry run for the olympics and possible world cup bid as well recouping lost revenue for th FA.

Come on Gordon Bring it Home!!!

rejection.details: Association Football is a self-governing sport. Please address your request to the FA
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
